com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.ai

Interface ModularFleetAIAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CampaignFleetAIAPI

    public interface ModularFleetAIAPI
extends CampaignFleetAIAPI
    Assignment module: keeps track of assignments and when they are completed (due to time or proximity), doesn't do any thinking. Strategic module: figures out how to go about doing assignments - what the current destination is, jump plans, etc. Tactical module: takes strategic considerations and combines with local conditions, i.e. terrain, hostile fleets, etc. Also handles encounter decisions, since those need to be consistent with tactical ones (i.e. no pursuing a fleet it then won't want to engage). The tactical module is the one that sets the fleet's movement destination. Navigation module: figures out the best direction to move in, given what the tactical module decides matters. Tactical module then may use the result if it wants to. Ability AI plugins: communicate with the above using the fleet's memory.
    Author:
    Alex Mosolov Copyright 2015 Fractal Softworks, LLC
